name: DisKO
description:
Shoot the monsters down, but beware of the bullets!

arrow keys to move and z to shoot a disk.

disks can kill you. your aim is to kill as many monsters as you can without dying.

You can play the slightly better version here https://gulan28.com/disko/

As you can see, this was made in a hurry .Do let me know about the bugs (Oh there are bugs!!)
